titleStmt.title: The present settlement vindicated, and the late mis-government proved in answer to a seditious letter from a pretended loyal member of the Church of England to a relenting abdicator / by a gentleman of Ireland.
titleStmt.author: Gentleman of Ireland.

notesStmt.note: Caption title: An answer to a late seditious letter from a pretended loyal member of the Church of England.
Advertisements on p. [2] at beginning and p. [1] at end.
Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
